content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Hello Haoyu, 

I am willing to start the negotiation process at 2000 Euros. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for initiating the discussion. However, aiming for a lower price, I would counter your offer with 'I propose to begin negotiations at 1800 Euros due to the apartment being newly built and its location in the city center.'
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I will consider your proposal, but I am not convinced by your reasoning. I will offer 1900 Euros as a counter-proposal. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In response to your offer, I maintain my position seeking a lower price. 'Given the apartment's condition and prime location benefits, I would rather stick with my initial proposal of 1800 Euros.'
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your point of view, but I am not convinced. I will offer 1950 Euros as a counter-proposal. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While acknowledging your latest proposal, I remain firm in my stance. 'Although I appreciate your offer, I cannot accept 1950 Euros, and would prefer to continue negotiations at the earlier mentioned price of 1800 Euros.'
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your decision. However, I do not want to continue the negotiation, because I believe your proposed price is too low. I believe the apartment's value is worth more than what you are offering.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Upon understanding your stance, I concede to your decision. 'TERMINATE'
name: Haoyu Wang from China
